customer.title: Site Policies
customer.introduction: Welcome to NailsGestionApp. Below you will find our site policies which include our user debugging policies and terms of use. Please read through these policies to understand how we manage user data and the rules governing the use of our site.

debuggingPolicies.intro: Our application may collect certain user data for debugging purposes. This data helps us improve our service and address any issues that users may encounter. The following outlines our policies regarding user debugging:
debuggingPolicies.dataCollection: Data Collection: We may collect data related to user interactions and application performance to diagnose and resolve issues.
debuggingPolicies.dataUsage: Data Usage: The collected data is used solely for debugging and improving the application. It is not shared with third parties.
debuggingPolicies.dataPrivacy: Data Privacy: We take user privacy seriously and implement appropriate measures to ensure that collected data is securely stored and handled.
debuggingPolicies.userConsent: User Consent: By using our application, you consent to the collection and use of data for debugging purposes as described in this policy.

termsOfUse.intro: By accessing or using NailsGestionApp, you agree to comply with the following terms:
termsOfUse.acceptance: Acceptance: By using our application, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, please do not use our service.
termsOfUse.modificationOfTerms: Modification of Terms: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
termsOfUse.prohibitedUses: Prohibited Uses: You agree not to use our application for any unlawful purposes or in a manner that could damage, disable, or impair our service.
termsOfUse.limitationOfLiability: Limitation of Liability: NailsGestionApp is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our application.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to help you book your next manicure appointment with ease. Feel free to reach out to us for any inquiries or assistance.
